name: High Stakes (Brown-RISD Game Developers, aechang, allidynia, Thuleanx)
name_original: High Stakes (Brown-RISD Game Developers, aechang, allidynia, Thuleanx)
description:
High Stakes

A 2.5D turn-based puzzle game where mobs attempt to kill a tired vampire who just wants to get home.

Controls:

Q or E to rotate the camera

Mouse click to move vampire to selected tile

Credits
